measure: prohibition on all organized events in the context of Carnival 2020
recommendation to stay at home when sick and to contact a general practitioner
recommendation to cough and sneeze in a paper towel or, were that not at hand, in an armpit
recommendation to wash hand several times a day with water and soap or a disinfectant
recommendation to avoid contact with people suffering from acute respiratory diseases
in case of symptoms, contact a general practitioner or a health service
in case of symptoms, do not go to medical praxis without direction of a doctor
test are carried out at the Basel University Hospital and at the University Children's hospital in case of children. Do not take public transportation on your way there.
people that have been in contact with diseased are contacted by the cantonal physician. Quarantine is to be implemented at home
hospital visitors should be pointed out to follow the rules of conduct of the BAG
the Europa-League eight-final of the 19.03.2020 FC Basel - Frankfurt does not take place
all the schools are closed from 16.03.2020 until the summer break
meeting of 100 people or more are prohibited
restaurant are not allowed to accommodate more than 50 people.
the cantonal museums and sport facilities are closed starting from 14.03.2020
the council meeting on 18.03.2020 has been canceled
postponement of the cantonal ballot of 17.05.2020
